clinical_history: Urinary difficulty and suspected prostate enlargement.
technique: Color Doppler and spectral analysis performed where necessary.
findings: Soft tissue region demonstrates mildly thickened without fluid collection.
Fetal cardiac activity present with FHR 35.63 bpm.
Breast tissue shows homogeneous lesion measuring 8.18 mm.
Thyroid gland shows hyperechoic echotexture; no suspicious nodules.
Common bile duct measures 32.58 mm, within normal limits.
